Modulos.Encriptado_files module

Modulos.Encriptado_files.caesar_decrypt(ciphertext, shift)[source]

Decrypt ciphertext using a Caesar cipher with the negative of the given shift value.

Modulos.Encriptado_files.caesar_encrypt(plaintext, shift)[source]

Encrypt plaintext using a Caesar cipher with the given shift value.
